meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being snobbish.
meanings.sent1: Her snobbishnesses were evident in the way she looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: His snobbishnesses made it difficult for him to make friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite her snobbishnesses, she was still a kind person at heart.
meanings.sent4: The snobbishnesses of the elite club members was like a thick fog in the room.
meanings.sent5: The snobbishnesses of the fashion industry can be overwhelming at times.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a snob.
meanings.sent1: His snobbishnesses were on full display when he refused to talk to anyone not wearing designer clothes.
meanings.sent2: She exhibited snobbishnesses by only associating with people from wealthy families.
meanings.sent3: The cat's snobbishnesses towards the new kitten were both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent4: The snobbishnesses of the queen bee in the hive caused tension among the other bees.
meanings.sent5: The snobbishnesses of the celebrity chef were legendary in the culinary world.
